mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Admin (user_id, name, email, phone) SELECT U.id, U.name, U.email, U.phone FROM User AS U WHERE U.id=#{user_id};
mapper.select: select A.id, A.user_id, A.name, A.phone, A.email from Admin AS A JOIN User AS U ON U.id = A.user_id WHERE (U.status = 0 OR U.status = -2) AND U.id = A.user_id AND U.deldate is null ORDER BY A.regdate desc;
select U.id, U.name, U.phone, U.email from User AS U WHERE U.status = 2 ORDER BY U.regdate desc;
